channel.title: Detrended Fluctuation Analysis on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in Detrended Fluctuation Analysis on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Day 2 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Scaling exponents as quantifiers of proficiency, health & well-being (fractal physiology) Correlation functions (Multi-) fractal fluctuation analyses Early warning signals of phase transitions Tentative time table for Day 2 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Detecting (nonlinear) structure in time series FH Ergodicity, PACF, Fractal Dimension, Relative Roughness, Sample Entropy, Alan variance, Clustering 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.
